argumentDescriptions.Connection: Your connection ID with Google Drive
argumentDescriptions.Parent Folder Path: The path to the parent folder
argumentDescriptions.Query: Define the file type to download
argumentDescriptions.ID: The ID of folder or file

returnDescriptions.Folder: The created folder. This is a dictionary, contains: id (folder id), url (folder url)
returnDescriptions.File List: A list of files. Each file is a dictionary, contains: id (file id), url (file url), name (file name), is_folder, mimeType (file mime type), size (file size), modifiedTime (file modified time)
returnDescriptions.File/Folder: The file/folder. This is a dictionary, contains: id (file/folder id), url (file/folder url), name (file/folder name), is_folder, mimeType (file/folder mime type), size (file/folder size), modifiedTime (file/folder modified time)

common.noActivitiesAvailable: No activities available in this package
